- make sure dev branch is pushed so travis is run

- update version in jqtree.jquery.json
- update version in downloads.md
- change date and version in changelog.md
- update version in bower.json

$ git add bower.json jqtree.jquery.json _entries/06_downloads.md _entries/09_changelog.md
$ git commit

$ git checkout master
$ git merge dev

$ git checkout gh-pages
$ git merge master

$ git checkout master
$ git push origin master

$ git tag 0.22.0
$ git push origin --tags

$ git checkout gh-pages
$ git push origin gh-pages
